title: NFCPlaceUpdate
description: Describes a place that uses nfc product

user_id.description: The ID of the user corespponding to an account in social networks

user_type.description: The auth provider for the user: FB or G+

place_likes.description: How many likes has the location total

user_likes.description: How many likes the last user has for this place in total

place_name.description: The location name as registered in the system

refresh.description: The data refresh interval in seconds
